description: The Chrysalis is the undisputed pride of the Terran fleet - a magnificent vessel, with its unique mix of power, size and Terran-style grace. Even when designing a ship more akin to a moving city, the Terrans did not forget to give the vessel the visual polish it deserved. The Chrysalis served the Terran Colonial Union well when arriving through the Gateway; as the TCUâ€™s colonization phase slowed, they began to appear in public and private auctions.

abilities.name: Integrated Hyperscan
abilities.description: Activating the Terran Integrated Hyperscan explores all hexes adjacent to the vehicle, and can be used once every five days.
